data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a throw-in for Bahia, close to Coritiba's area.
In the minute 3, Goal! Giovanni Augusto gives Coritiba a 1-0 lead in Curitiba.
Great play from William Matheus to set up the goal.
Coritiba have a goal kick.
In the minute 5, Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Coritiba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Bahia.
In the minute 8, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick Bahia.
Coritiba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 9, Coritiba's Matheus Sales gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Bahia goal kick.
Elber for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 11, Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a Coritiba throw-in in Bahia's half.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a free kick to Coritiba.
Mattheus for Coritiba gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 12, Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira awards Bahia a goal kick.
Throw-in Coritiba.
Throw-in for Coritiba at Estadio Couto Pereira.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Bahia in their own half.
Can Bahia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Coritiba's half?
Bahia are in shooting range from this free kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Curitiba.
In the minute 17, Giovanni Augusto is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Coritiba's Mailton breaks free at Estadio Couto Pereira. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 18, Goal kick for Bahia at Estadio Couto Pereira.
Throw-in for Bahia at Estadio Couto Pereira.
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira.
In the minute 22, Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Coritiba needs to be cautious. Bahia have an attacking throw-in.
Bahia pushes forward through Elber, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 24, Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Corner awarded to Bahia.
Ball goes out of play for a Coritiba goal kick.
In the minute 26, Throw-in for Bahia in the half of Coritiba.
Bahia to take a throw-in in Coritiba territory.
Coritiba’s Giovanni Augusto is on his feet again at Estadio Couto Pereira.
In the minute 29, Throw-in for Coritiba in the half of Bahia.
Bahia attack but Fessin's header doesn't find the target.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira awards Coritiba a goal kick.
In the minute 31, Free kick in a good position for Bahia!
Robson (Coritiba) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Lucas Fonseca (Bahia) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 32, Coritiba have a goal kick.
Elber is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
Matheus Bahia with an assist there.
In the minute 37, Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
Free kick for Coritiba in the half of Bahia.
Bahia are pushing forward but Nino Paraiba's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 40, Goal kick for Coritiba at Estadio Couto Pereira.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Curitiba.
Ball safe as Coritiba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 42, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Coritiba close to the penalty box.
Coritiba's Giovanni Augusto gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Bahia defender.
Coritiba have been awarded a corner by Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira.
In the minute 45, Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira.
In the minute 45, Gilberto gets his shot on target but fails to score for Bahia.
The first half has been concluded at Estadio Couto Pereira.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Mano Menezes is making the team's first substitution at Estadio Couto Pereira with Juninho replacing Anderson Martins.
Coritiba have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Coritiba.
In the minute 48, Goal kick for Bahia at Estadio Couto Pereira.
In Curitiba Coritiba attack through William Matheus. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Bahia goal kick.
In the minute 52, Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Coritiba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bahia's half?
In the minute 53, Throw-in Bahia.
Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Throw-in for Coritiba close to the penalty box.
In the minute 55, Can Coritiba capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bahia's half?
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira awards Bahia a goal kick.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a Bahia throw-in in Coritiba's half.
Fessin of Bahia gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Curitiba.
In the minute 57, In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 57, Daniel (Bahia) gets a yellow card. He will be suspended from the next match!
Rodriguinho is on a sub for Daniel for Bahia.
Bahia to take a throw-in in Coritiba territory.
In the minute 59, Coritiba have been awarded a corner by Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Bahia's Ronaldo attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 61, Coritiba have a goal kick.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Coritiba drives forward and Neilton gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 62, Corner awarded to Coritiba.
Throw-in high up the field for Bahia in Curitiba.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 65, Bahia make their third substitution with Zeca replacing Matheus Bahia.
The away team replace Fessin with Rossi.
Coritiba have been awarded a corner by Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira.
Coritiba's Robson misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 69, It's a goal kick for the away team in Curitiba.
In the minute 69, Jorginho (Coritiba) is making a first substitution, with Rodrigo Muniz replacing Neilton.
Bahia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 71, Bahia's Rodriguinho has been booked in Curitiba.
Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
Mailton for Coritiba has been booked by Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 73, Zeca scores to make it 1-2 at Estadio Couto Pereira.
Elber instrumental with a fine assist.
Bahia will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Coritiba.
In the minute 75, Mattheus of Coritiba is pulled up for offside.
Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Estadio Couto Pereira, Giovanni Augusto has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 76, Marco Antonio is replacing Elber for the away team.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira awards Coritiba a goal kick.
In Curitiba, Rodriguinho of Bahia is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Bahia.
Ball goes out of play for a Coritiba goal kick.
In the minute 81, Martin Sarrafiore is replacing Mattheus for Coritiba at Estadio Couto Pereira.
In the minute 83, Goal kick for Bahia at Estadio Couto Pereira.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
Throw-in for Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 87, Can Coritiba capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Ronaldo (Bahia) has been given a yellow card and will be suspended from the next match.
Throw-in for Bahia at Estadio Couto Pereira.
Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Bahia's Rossi is back in action after a slight knock.
Corner awarded to Coritiba.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a throw-in for Coritiba, close to Bahia's area.
In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Coritiba have been awarded a corner by Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira.
Can Coritiba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bahia's half?
The match is over. Final score 1-2.
Attention is being given to Bahia’s Rossi and play has been suspended briefly.
The home team have replaced Matheus Sales with Pablo Thomaz. This is the third substitution made today by Jorginho.
Gregore is booked for the away team.
